resources.string: Find a healthy snack you enjoy (such as baby carrots or celery sticks) and always carry it with you
Keep your mouth busy with a chewing gum or a candy
Exercise, when you stop smoking it is good to increase physical activity
Eat lots of fruit. Fresh fruits and vegetables help to overcome the urge to smoke
Think positive. Stop associating quitting smoking with deprivation of something, but make an effort to understand that you can only get great benefits from this choice.
Take a sauna
Cut back on caffeine, it has a greater effect on nicotine addicts
Cleaning the house is one way to get rid of the smoker mentality
Take a nap
Buy a stress reliever game. It is important to find new ways to relax and calm down without nicotine
Meditation may seem like an exotic remedy for quitting smoking but it is a fantastic way to manage some psychological aspects of nicotine deficiency
Talk to a friend on the phone
For parents: lead by example. A parent who quits, or at least doesn\'t smoke, is the best way to get the child to do the same
Take a shower
Cook your favorite dish
Watch a movie, a TV series, or a documentary
Take up new hobbies
Keep your mind busy by reading a good book
Drink lots of water. When you stop smoking, it is good to drink plenty of water and move more
The piggy bank. A good incentive to quit smoking is to give yourself a final reward, in stages
Remove temptations at home: ashtrays, lighters, objects that evoke smoke
Don\'t be discouraged. Relapses are completely natural in the tiring journey that leads to quitting smoking, do not forget that it is an addiction
Breathe in a straw from your fingers
Plan your next trip
For parents: a reward if the child stops. If your child reacts positively and is able to quit, he deserves a reward
Take a walk and experience the sensation of deep breathing again
Brush your teeth to make the urge to smoke go away
Throw away anything that reminds you of cigarettes
Listen to your favorite music
